# The methods section (or chapter)

## Why methods matter?

Once upon a time  the methods section was abbreviated, overly summarized, or even relegated. The movement for increased reproducibility and rigor in science has reinstated the importance of the methods section. 

Methods are now a key element in establishing the credibility of the research, alongside the open availability of data and results.
